author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_14_1_X` (branch `CMSSW_14_2_X`): 
   * This is the PR for the master branch, which will then be backported down to 14_1_X (the latter is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development).

These updates correspond to the changes accumulated in the 14_1_X release cycle for the "**PRef V1.0**" menu: first menu for the 2024 pp reference data-taking period.

This update includes the integration of the following changes:
- migration of the combined HLT table and related subtables to `CMSSW_14_1_1`

In addition we include the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

- [CMSHLT-3325](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3325) [HIN] Forward/UPC Triggers request for pp Reference Run 2024
- [CMSHLT-3338](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3338) [HIN] Muon Triggers for PbPb Run 2024
- [CMSHLT-3340](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3340) [HIN] Jet Triggers for pp Reference Run 2024
- [CMSHLT-3343](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3343) [HIN] E/gamma Triggers for pp Reference Run 2024
- [CMSHLT-3345](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3345) [HIN] Remove `PPRefExotica` PD/stream and re-assign paths to `PPRefSingleMuon`
- [CMSHLT-3346](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3346) [HIN] Justify `Commissioning{ZDC,RawPrime}` PDs in the `PRef` menu
- [CMSHLT-3348](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3348) [HIN] Add two seeds to `hltL1sUPCHFafterglowCombined`
- [CMSHLT-3350](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3350) [HIN] Forward/UPC Triggers request for PbPb Run 2024
- [CMSHLT-3356](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3356) [HIN] E/gamma Triggers for PbPb Run 2024
- [CMSHLT-3357](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3357) [TSG] Release of special menus V1.6 (for `PRef`, `HIon` runs)
- [CMSHLT-3363](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3363) [HIN,TSG] Sync offline menu with the 2023 `PRef` online menu

In this PR we also have the following commits:
   * 3da490438fd845e42a04622bca718bdccbd8ceb2 update of L1T HIon menu in TSG GTs to `L1Menu_CollisionsHeavyIons2024_v1_0_5_xml` 
   * 0a490e2cf7f1c7ede75cf0c90a9800f7f1597568 Finalize integration of the following tickets
        * [CMSHLT-3310](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3310) [TSG] update input files for TSG tests to more modern datasets (2024)
   * 0880f314a1ebe27203d82131471ffe30e1bbc484 Update `hltPathOwners.json` including paths for menus `PRef` 2024 V1.0 and `HIon` 2024 V1.0
   * d07ff7967fd91337163b6ca6a836ed4e11c6e092 Bumped version of Paths for HLT PRef-2024 V1.0

#### PR validation:

TSG Integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, but it will be backported to `CMSSW_14_1_X`.
title: HLT menu development for `14_1_X` (2/N) [`14_2_X`]
